00016 #ifndef TLIST_H_
00017 #define TLIST_H_
00018 
00019 #include <inttypes.h>
00020 
00021 #include "msched.h"
00022 
00024 typedef struct {
00026    thread_t *head;
00028    thread_t *tail;
00029 } tlist_t;
00030 
00033 #define mos_tlist_init(list) do {               \
00034       (list)->head = NULL;                      \
00035       (list)->tail = NULL;                      \
00036    } while(0)
00037 
00042 #define mos_tlist_add(list,item) do {           \
00043       if((list)->head == NULL) {                \
00044          (list)->head = item;                   \
00045          (list)->tail = item;                   \
00046          (item)->next = NULL;                   \
00047       } else {                                  \
00048          (list)->tail->next = item;             \
00049          (list)->tail = item;                   \
00050          (item)->next = NULL;                   \
00051       }                                         \
00052    } while(0)
00053 
00058 thread_t *mos_tlist_remove(tlist_t *list);
00059 
00065 thread_t *mos_tlist_get_thread(tlist_t *list, uint16_t id);
00066 
00069 void mos_tlist_ordadd(tlist_t *list, thread_t *item);
00070 
00073 #define mos_tlist_adjustst(list,atime) do {     \
00074       thread_t *adjust_front = (list)->head;    \
00075       while(adjust_front) {                     \
00076          if(atime > adjust_front->st) {         \
00077             atime -= adjust_front->st;          \
00078             adjust_front->st = 0;               \
00079             adjust_front = adjust_front->next;  \
00080          } else {                               \
00081             adjust_front->st -= atime;          \
00082             break;                              \
00083          }                                      \
00084       }                                         \
00085    } while(0)
00086 
00091 #define mos_tlist_head(list) (list)->head
00092 
00093 #endif
